title: BUG: Mobile mail notifications show pulsing audio icon but no sound plays
description:
On desktop, mail notifications automatically start playing sound. On mobile, the audio icon pulses but no audio plays.

Expected: Audio should auto-play on mobile like it does on desktop
Actual: Audio icon pulses but no sound

Platform: Mobile (iOS/Android TBD)
close_reason: Fixed iPad detection for mobile audio. Modern iPads report as Macintosh in UA, now detected via maxTouchPoints > 1. Pushed to main.

title: Pre-existing test failure: useVoiceInput MediaRecorder mocking
description:
6 tests failing in frontend/tests/unit/useVoiceInput.test.ts due to MediaRecorder.isTypeSupported not being mocked correctly in jsdom. Failures:
- should handle recording errors
- should handle transcription errors  
- should cancel without transcribing
- should clear the transcript
All related to MediaRecorder API mocking.

title: Add crew messaging and notifications
description:
attached_molecule: adj-wisp-yt8wi
attached_at: 2026-01-25T15:53:53Z
dispatched_by: mayor

Add the ability to send messages to and receive notifications from any crew members in the adjutant dashboard.

Features needed:
- Send messages to crew members (polecats, witnesses, refineries)
- Receive notifications when crew members send messages
- Display crew member messages in the notification system

Related: Builds on existing mail/notification infrastructure.
notes:
Implemented: crew messaging and notifications for adjutant dashboard

New hooks:
- useCrewMessaging: send messages to crew members with address resolution
- useCrewNotifications: monitor for new crew messages

New components:
- CrewMessageComposer: UI for selecting crew and composing messages
- CrewNotificationBadge: displays unread crew message count

Utilities:
- buildCrewAddress: convert CrewMember to mail address format
- isCrewMessage: identify crew messages vs overseer messages

Also fixed accessibility issues in PolecatCard (role='listitem', data-testid).

All tests pass (except pre-existing useVoiceInput failures - filed as adj-esj46).
